vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
πορν-εία,
Ionic dialect πορν-είη, ἡ, prostitution, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; of a man, [Refs 4th c.BC+]; fornication, unchastity, [NT]
__II metaphorically, idolatry, [LXX]
vocabInfos.shortDef: sexual immorality, fornication, marital unfaithfulness, prostitution, adultery, a generic term for sexual sin of any kind
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
sexual immorality, fornication, marital unfaithfulness, prostitution, adultery, a generic term for sexual sin of any kind
fornication, whoredom, Mt. 15:19; Mk. 7:21; Acts 15:20, 29; concubinage, Jn. 8:41; adultery, Mt. 5:32; 19:9; incest, 1Cor. 5:1; lewdness, uncleanness, generically, Rom. 1:29; from the Hebrew, put symbolically for idolatry, Rev. 2:21; 14:8
vocabInfos._es_Definition: inmoralidad sexual ; infidelidad (MAT.5:32; 19:9) ; no somos bastardos (JN.8:41)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 賣淫, 不貞, 通姦
2) 啟示錄中的巴比倫以淫婦的形象出現,與眾國行淫
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 卖淫, 不贞, 通奸
2) 启示录中的巴比伦以淫妇的形象出现,与众国行淫
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: sự gian dâm; thờ hình tượng; ngoại tình; tình dục bất hợp pháp. Xem G4203
